attributes.action: not ignore ePetitions or get voted out of office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent 'mockery' of the response to the overwhelming public support for several ePetitions shows that the government has lost touch with the people.

Unless the government takes these petitions seriously we the undersigned promise not to vote for the current party in government at the next general election

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
